articles.title: Wearable 'Ai Pin' launched by Humane, backed by ex-Apple executives and Microsoft - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The Ai Pin, as the device is called, is designed to be worn on clothing and can be tapped to talk to a virtual assistant powered by technologies from ChatGPT-creator OpenAI and cloud computing power from Microsoft. It uses a laser projection system to display…
articles.content: Humane, a Silicon Valley startup with a star-studded list of co-founders and executives, on Thursday released a $699 device that aims to bring cutting-edge artificial intelligence to a lapel near you… [+1575 chars]

articles.author: Sophia Ktori
articles.title: CRISPR High-Throughput Screening Identifies Master Regulator That Could Enhance Cancer T-Cell Therapy - Genetic Engineering & Biotechnology News
articles.description: Researchers used a CRISPR-based screening platform to identify genes that could potentially improve T-cell therapies for cancer treatment.
articles.content: Researchers at Duke University have adapted CRISPR technologies to enable high-throughput screening of gene function in human immune cells, and discovered that a single master regulator of the genome… [+7026 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Amazing aurora after solar storm strike! Just check out this NASA image of Utah sky from ISS - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA wows space enthusiasts with a dazzling snapshot of an aurora snapped from the International Space Station after a solar storm. The green celestial display above Utah has captured the imaginations of viewers worldwide.
articles.content: Prepare to be captivated by the latest visual treat from NASA as the space agency has unveiled a breathtaking image of an aurora taken from the International Space Station (ISS) after a solar storm s… [+2020 chars]
